text: Roberto Gimelli (born 16 July 1982 in Canosa di Puglia, Italy) is an Italian footballer who plays as a defender. He is currently playing for Italian Lega Pro Prima Divisione team Pisa. ==External links== * *Profile at aic.football.it Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:People from Canosa di Puglia Category:Italian footballers Category:Vastese Calcio 1902 players Category:U.S. Catanzaro 1929 players Category:U.S. Triestina Calcio 1918 players Category:U.S. Pistoiese 1921 players Category:A.C. title: Roberto Gimelli
